Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: Falafel and beer only. Skip the rest. The have a great location and a very good idea. Unfortunately they cannot deliver. Pitas average and chicken extremely dry and tasteless. Wine overpriced vis a vis quality. Go somewhere else ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: WOW! We used peperwortel catering services for a 5 day film production. The food was healthy AND delicious, always delivered on time and served hot. Great mix of hot/cold food for lunch and generous portions and lots of snacks. 12 hour days ‚Ä¶

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: Exceeded the expectations in all aspects. Quick reaction time, flexible, considerate, very professional. The quality of the food was superb and the service fantastic.

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: Best amsterdam food. We had been there in 2015 and but I could never forget the amazing taste and even the address. You are awesome!

Name: Peperwortel

I would give 5üéñ, but very dirty look of the staff and this place in general, force me to give only 2üéñ. Because if it is going about the food, it has to be clean without any exception.

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: I was a little bit disappointed with the vegan version of a Libanese dish. I guess the lamb was substituted with beans which made the dish dry. There was no vegan dip while the original recipe was served with a side of yoghurt I believe. ‚Ä¶

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: The food although overpriced is tasty. The real problem with this place is the staff, who gave me a receipt (and a bill) which didn't correspond to what I ordered (wasn't a mistake), and when later asked about it, lied to me about what I ordered. Just short with their customer, unfriendly and eventually untrustworthy.

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: There must be some misunderstanding. The price, as other reviews mentioned, is one problem, but the thing is, what they offer can hardly be difined as food. The chicken is so dry that it could drain the river of the Amazon forest. Other stuff just so-so. The best dish I recommend is the 3-euro salad from Albert Heijn nearby.

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: Loved the thing that I ordered. Something with minced lamb. :)

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: The decoration and its outdoor vibe put you in a "craving for something delicious" mood. Unfortunately it didn't meet our expectations. Mediocre food and not value for money( not even close). Too expensive for what you get.

Name: Peperwortel
Review Text: Tasty, warm and welcoming. Perfect place to recoup your energy after a long stroll in Vodelpark. Tram stop right outside to take you back into the centre. Will make sure i return next time i'm in Amsterdam for sure. Dank je
